name: Berger & Argenti - Clasico - Churchill
additionalNotes: Berger & Argenti makes world class premium cigar brands like Entubar, Entubar CRV, Entubar Quad Maduro, Clasico and Mooch. Their cigars are handmade and produced in small batches with Nicaraguan tobacco so they maintain a high standard of quality. Berger & Argenti cigars are recognized for their rich flavor, craftsmanship and value. Cuban Crafters is a Berger & Argenti authorized dealer, so you know you're getting fresh and authentic Berger Argenti cigars.
